from opyrability import nlp_based_approach
import numpy as np

import time

def shower2x2(u):
    y = np.zeros(2)
    y[0]=u[0]+u[1]
    if y[0]!=0:
        y[1]=(u[0]*60+u[1]*120)/(u[0]+u[1])
    else:
        y[1]=(60+120)/2
        
    return y

u0 = np.array([0, 10])
lb = np.array([0, 0])
ub = np.array([100,100])

DOS_bound = np.array([[17.5, 21.0],
                    [80.0, 100.0]])

DOSresolution = [10, 10]
    

t = time.time()
fDIS, fDOS, message = nlp_based_approach(shower2x2,
                                        DOS_bound, 
                                        DOSresolution,
                                        u0, 
                                        lb,
                                        ub, 
                                        method='ipopt', 
                                        plot=True, 
                                        ad=False,
                                        warmstart=False)
    
    
elapsed = time.time() - t
